title: Dark Legacy
description: Nothing like falling for your sworn enemy and starting a war.I live in a world where demons exist. I’ve been trained as a lethal weapon to hunt and kill in order to protect humans. That is until I met him—an incubus—an alluring, sensual, dream-weaving demon that ignites every fiber of my being and leaves me yearning for more of him. I shouldn’t want him. He’s the enemy, everything I’ve been trained to hate. Yet, there’s no fighting it, our desire is electric, the heat combustive.What’s worse is…I want out. I want a life of my own without orders or the solitude of being a hunter. I want freedom. Only problem is, the organization I work for gives you two choices; obey orders or die.I have other plans.To get out, I dig into their secrets. The more I dig, the darker those secrets become. They’ll do whatever it takes to protect themselves and bury their problems.In order to survive, I have to turn to the enemy. It’s in his passionate arms where I discover the truth and reclaim my freedom.Together, we fight against a new enemy—the Arcane Society—and save more than just our lives…From the Author: If you like action-packed, paranormal, urban fantasies that feature a bad@ss heroine, a dangerous hero, and a ste@my enemies-to-lovers romance, then this adventure is for you!
author: Betty Legend
